title: Can we add a "Suspicious" ping?
body: That way you wouldn't have to add ten different pings for everything and you'd only have to tag a bush as suspicious to warn your team, whether it's somebody in the bush or it's warded.

replies.body: Use the "?" or the "!" Ping. That should get their attention.
I use the "caution" ping for suspicious. I only use the "danger" ping if i know for 100% certain that an enemy is near. I use caution for most everything else

use the enemy missing ping for suspicious

I only use the caution ping (control click) for telling allies to gtfo so the assclamation point (alt click up) is for wards, just tell your team the code at the start of the game.
